title: "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again"
body:
I bought a new laptop the other day and one of the first things I did was try to play some league on it but I always get disconnected in the champion loading screen at 60% even though my internet connection is fine. The computer is running windows 10 and has that free trial of Norton that all the new windows machines get.
I already white-listed league on my firewall.
I tried  the hextech repair tool.
I tried stopping the IP Helper service.
I tried deleting those files from the RADS folder and let league re-patch.
I tried using windows 10s compatibility mode for both windows 7 and 8.
And league still runs fine on my old windows 7 laptop so I know its not an ISP issue(Bell Canada).
 {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
What do I do? Help me!!

replies.body: This is currently happening to me as well. No issues with my ISP (Bell Canada), tried a fresh install but it did not resolve this issue. Any other ways to solve this issue?
Never mind, I got it! I just uninstalled the whole game and tried installing it again >.<

Sounds like League might not have been installed correctly if it was being disconnected around 60% each time. Most likely, some firewall blocked a file or two during the download. Great job getting that fixed up!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
